Matrix - Class in visualcryptography.matrix
The Matrix class is the holder of the object created by the MatrixConstructor object.
Matrix(int, int) - Constructor for class visualcryptography.matrix.Matrix
Constructor is used to create a (height)x(width) matrix M of integers.
Matrix() - Method in class visualcryptography.matrix.Matrix
Constructor is used to create a 0x0 matrix M.
matrixConstructor - Variable in class visualcryptography.EncryptAction
 
MatrixConstructor - Class in visualcryptography.matrix
MatrixConstructor is used to create the matrix c0 and c1 used for encrypting.

MyGif - Class in visualcryptography.codec.gif
MyGif is the main class for creating a black and white image it accepts any RGB image and then convert it to gray scale.
MyGif() - Constructor for class visualcryptography.codec.gif.MyGif
The default constructor used to instantiate a MyGif class and sets its dimension to 0x0.
MyGif(String) - Constructor for class visualcryptography.codec.gif.MyGif
Constructor used to open an instance of the MyGif class if open it sets the Bilevel image's dimension to the dimension of the opened image.
MyGif(String, int, int) - Constructor for class visualcryptography.codec.gif.MyGif
Constructor used to createan instance of the MyGif class if open it sets the Bilevel image's dimension to (height)x(width).

Submit a bug or feature at laizzez_faire07(@)yahoo.com. Visual Cryptography is an implementation of the newly discovered and developed visual encryption algorithm by Naor and Shamir at the Eurocrypt 1994. Copyright 2005 University of the Philippines, Los Ba±os, Laguna. All rights reserved.
